answers.answer: Get checked for diabetes and immunocompromise.It can also be caused by MRSA.http://casereports.bmj.com/content/2011/bcr.01.2011.3680.abstract

question: I know it may sound really strange but I am in so much pain from recurrent abscesses. The abscesses are usually on my leg or in my arm pit and under my breast. I had one in my rectum area too. I had been to the doctors so many times and put on dicloxicillin which seemed to help at the time, yet they still kept on recurring. i don't know what to do.......
title: abscess
